attributes.action: leave  his post  and  elect somebody else
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i  would like to start  this pettion   for  gordon brown  to leave parliment   as he and his party have  lied to the public about   the  missing  tax records  its wasnt a  junior offical that  lost them it was a senior offical that  lost them  and  to make it  worse the person who lost them was put up in a hotel out of tax payers money
